entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
